Trigger.Name: 死而不僵
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵|Walking Dead|ウォーキングデッド) from [^:]+? for 10\.00 Seconds\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} ${CasterName}陷入了“死而不僵”效果。
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 3 <se.1>
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 2 <se.1>
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 1 <se.1>

Trigger.Name: 死而不僵解除
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) loses the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵|Walking Dead|ウォーキングデッド) from [^:]+?\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能CD_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} [${AbilityName}] 就绪

Trigger.Name: 读条
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}14:.{0,4}:(?<SourceName>[^:]+?) starts using (?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ) on (?<TargetName>[^:]+?)\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_复活_发送频道}} 读条${AbilityName}：${var:${SourceName}职业} → ${var:${TargetName}职业}

Trigger.Name: 判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}15:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?):.{0,4}:(?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ):.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?):

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_复活_发送频道}} ${CasterName}（${var:${CasterName}职业}）MP:${_ffxivparty[${CasterName}].currentmp} 醒梦CD:${numeric:max(round(60-(${_systemtimems}-${var:${CasterName}醒梦})/1000,1),0)}

Trigger.Name: 醒梦
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (醒梦|Lucid Dreaming|ルーシッドドリーム) from [^:]+? for 21\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 死亡
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}19:(?<name>.+?) was defeated by (?<target>.+?)\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_死亡_发送频道}} ${name}（${var:${name}职业}）死亡。即刻CD:${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_WHM}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_SCH}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_AST}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_SMN}

Trigger.Name: 即刻
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (即刻咏唱|Swiftcast|迅速魔) from [^:]+? for 10\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (摆脱|Shake It Off|シェイクオフ) from

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) loses the effect of (摆脱|Shake It Off|シェイクオフ) from

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<PlayerName>.+?) gains the effect of (圣光幕帘|Divine Veil|ディヴァインヴェール) from (?<CasterName>.+?) for \d+\.\d+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<PlayerName>.+?) loses the effect of (圣光幕帘|Divine Veil|ディヴァインヴェール) from

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) loses the effect of (鼓舞|Galvanize|鼓舞) from

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (鼓舞|Galvanize|鼓舞) from (?<CasterName>.+)? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) loses the effect of (炽天的幕帘|Seraphic Veil|セラフィックヴェール) from

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (炽天的幕帘|Seraphic Veil|セラフィックヴェール) from

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) loses the effect of (天星冲日（夜）|Nocturnal Opposition|星天対抗［夜］) from

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (天星冲日（夜）|Nocturnal Opposition|星天対抗［夜］) from (?<CasterName>.+)? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: loses
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) loses the effect of (黑夜领域|Nocturnal Field|ノクターナルフィールド) from

Trigger.Name: gains
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (黑夜领域|Nocturnal Field|ノクターナルフィールド) from (?<CasterName>.+)? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 策动减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (策动|Tactician|タクティシャン) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 防守之桑巴减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (防守之桑巴|Shield Samba|守りのサンバ) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 行吟减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (行吟|Troubadour|トルバドゥール) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 节制减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (节制|Temperance|テンパランス) from .+? for (?<time>5\.00) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 命运之轮减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (命运之轮|Collective Unconscious|運命の輪：効果) from .+? for (?<time>(?:4|5|19|20)\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 野战治疗阵减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (野战治疗阵|Sacred Soil|野戦治療の陣：効果) from .+? for (?<time>[45]\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 暗黑布道减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (暗黑布道|Dark Missionary|ダークミッショナリー) from .+? for (?<time>15\.00) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: *清除变量
Trigger.RegularExpression: You have entered a sanctuary|进入了休息区。|レストエリアに入った！|^.{15}21:........:4000001[026]

Trigger.Name: 武装戍卫减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (武装|Arms Up|パッセージ・オブ・アームズ：効果) from .+? for (?<time>[45]\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 异想的幻光减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (..的幻光|Fey Illumination|フェイイルミネーション|Seraphic Illumination|セラフィックイルミネーション) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 光之心减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (光之心|Heart of Light|ハート・オブ・ライト) from .+? for (?<time>15\.00) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 技能判定
Trigger.Description: 木人|伊甸|至尊伊甸|伊甸守护者|虚无行者|厄瑞玻斯的巨腕|利维亚桑|泰坦|极大泰坦|guardian of paradise|エデン・ガーデナー|Voidwalker|ヴォイドウォーカー|the Hand of Erebos|エレボスの巨腕|Leviathan|リヴァイアサン|Titan|タイタン|Titan Maximum|マキシタイタン

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_技能判定_发送频道}} 判定：${CasterName} → ${AbilityName} 无减伤

/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_技能判定_发送频道}} 判定：${CasterName} → ${AbilityName} 减伤：${var:单减_鼓舞}${var:单减_夜占盾}${var:单减_天星夜}${var:单减_炽天的幕帘}${var:单减_雪仇_${CasterName}}${var:单减_牵制_${CasterName}}${var:单减_昏乱_${CasterName}}${var:团减_策动}${var:团减_防守之桑巴}${var:团减_行吟}${var:团减_节制}${var:团减_命运之轮}${var:团减_野战治疗阵}${var:团减_异想的幻光}${var:团减_圣光幕帘}${var:团减_武装戍卫}${var:团减_摆脱}${var:团减_暗黑布道}${var:团减_光之心}

Trigger.Name: 攻击判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}15:.{8}:(?<BossName>至尊伊甸|伊甸守护者|虚无行者|利维亚桑|泰坦|极大泰坦|拉姆|迦楼罗|伊弗利特|赤翼罗羯坨博叉|暗黑心象|希瓦|圣龙):.+?:(?<AbilityName>攻击|Unknown_(42D9|413D|3E60|367)):.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?):.+?:(?<damage>.+?):

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_伊甸平A职能_发送频道}} BOSS对 【${var:${TargetName}职业}】 的攻击造成了${numeric:hex2dec(${func:substring(0,4):${func:padleft(48,8):${damage}}})}点伤害！

Trigger.Name: 触发
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 00:(?:00b9|0139):(?:距离战斗开始还有..秒！|Battle commencing in |戦闘開始まで)|^.{14} 21:.{8}:4000001[026]|^.{15}00:0839:.+?(”任务结束了。|has ended.|」の攻略を終了した。|任务开始|has begun\.|の攻略を開始した。)

Trigger.Name: 使用说明（双击打开描述）
Trigger.Description:
1.开启依赖：[鲶鱼精邮差]
2.配置鲶鱼精邮差的端口环境(bat)。重启ACT
3.可在[*设置]中设置发送的聊天频道
